name: Platinum Blush | DEVELOPED
description:
This is a collaborative creation by DEVELOPED: NaChef, Max Savage, Graham, Folkart, and Guest, Nick Evans.
Platinum Blush is our take on what a strawberry Nesquik shake should taste like.  It has an artificial shake essence to it, making it perfect for those who fell in love with that scrumptious delight.  Full flavor notes on DEVELOPED Episode 39 at https://youtu.be/6YDpnKJgUjg .

Our weekly episodes are released at 6:00pm EST every Tuesday, and catch our live shows every Thursday at 6pm EST 

Check out our website at https://www.DevelopedDIY.com
Find us on YouTube https://www.youtube.com/c/DevelopedDIY 
Follow us on Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/developeddiy/
Check out our FaceBook Page at https://www.facebook.com/developeddiy/
author: Developed

reviews.text:
This is a nice recipe
 but it is very soft and wish it were more saturated.

This is the first strawberry flavor I've ever made and vaped over 120ml of consecutively. Damn, das good. I definitely don't get pineapple from it, seems the FA Milk and VT Love is whats helping bend it into the strawberry. Stupid good. Subbed cap ss for Pur ss. I have cap but i just like pur way more for the same applications.

This is such a good recipe and the Pineapple Lassi with the VT Love is very clever . It lifts the whole recipe to another level and brings the Strawberry to life . Great mixing guys . Keep up the good work .

Graham was absolutely right! It is recipe of the year 2019! I've always had trouble with strawberries because I'm almost blind to them... This was a mystery because I can definitely taste ALL of the commercial S&C I've tried, but all recipes I've tried did fail me. Tried this one and it deserves all the hype it has generated. Acid from Pineapple Lassi blends with straws and after a 5 day to a week steep is indistinguishable and I'm sure if I wouldn't know it's there I would never be able to point it out.  And looks like that strawberries must be "bent" in order for me to taste them and one of the biggest mysteries of my vaping career has been solved... Nick (Nickevz) is a wizard and to all the Developed team - thank you for this masterpiece. Hey wayne stop being rear-hurt child and take goddamn notes haha!

So,when I first mixed this up I‚Äôve gotta be honest with you,I wasn‚Äôt digging it AT ALL!!!! The pineapple was far to forward for me and just took over everything. Now I‚Äôm not a fan of pineapple so initially,this was a huge no go for me! I then put the bottle away to steep for the 3 days as suggested and was absolutely SHOCKED at how this recipe had morphed in only 72hrs!!!! The pineapple has teamed up with the strawberry in such a way that it enhances its artificial like qualities that found in a nesquick milkshake. The milkshake base is a revelation! Thick,sweet,creamy goodness that  encompasses the strawberries to perfection. I‚Äôm actually blown away about how good this recipe actually is! Strawberry milk profiles are literally 10 2 the dozen and at some point, I‚Äôve probably tried them all! This is hands down the best strawberry milkshake I‚Äôve persoanlly EVER tried and I doff my proverbial hat off to you guys,great fucking job!!üëèüèªüëèüèªüëèüèª
Everything you could want in a strawberry milk, sweet syrupy silky strawberry milk, nice deep thick mouthfeel, if you like strawberry/cream recipes this ones for you.

It was nice off the shake, but after a 3 day steep, I am getting more of the 'Oh my God' factor.  Well done recipe.  I mixed it as directed, no subs.  The first couple of days the pineapple note was really there for me, but now, I am getting a delicious Strawberry Nisquik Shake.  I am glad I mixed 120ml.  Thanks for the recipe and awesome content.  :)

God Damn You Nevans! I was hoping this wasn't going to live up to the hype but it does. Off the shake you get that sweet pineapple lassi on the inhale and the sweet strawberry behind it. I'll probably only mix up this 60ml and not mix it after I kill it in a few days out of spite. Great job guys!

RECIPE OF THE YEAR HANDS DOWN no question about it it is everything a recipe of the year needs to be . the only one that comes close in this category is the joker reloaded  by nachef  https://alltheflavors.com/recipes/156147#joker_reloaded_by_nachef.
Excellent choice of flavors. Tested this both with and without sugar cookie and the sugar cookie does take it to a whole new level. Bravo on this thick creamy strawberry "Nesquik" recipe.

Hey folks Steve - Oohh here.....if you haven't mixed this up I highly encourage you to do so. This is one mix that really blew me away. What a great and awesome mix this came out to be. Thanks to all involved here Nick Evans, Folkart, Graham, NaChef, Max Savage. I love your shows keep up the great work you guys.
